tool_description: Realtor Search is an unofficial API that provides real-time data for searching for-sale and rental listings across the United States. It connects buyers, sellers, and renters with a wide range of residential properties, including houses, condos, townhouses, and apartments. The API features an extensive and constantly updated database of property listings.

api_list.name: agents/detail
api_list.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific real estate agent.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the agent, obtained from the agents/list API.

api_list.name: agents/list
api_list.description: List real estate agents based on a specified postal code.

required_parameters.name: postal_code
required_parameters.description: The postal code to search for agents.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sorting criteria for the agent list.

api_list.name: Get photos
api_list.description: Retrieve photos for a specific property.

required_parameters.name: property_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the property, obtained from the sale/rent API.

api_list.name: Search similar homes
api_list.description: Find properties similar to a specified property.

required_parameters.name: property_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the property, obtained from the sale/rent API.

api_list.name: Property details
api_list.description: Get detailed information about a specific property.

required_parameters.name: property_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the property, obtained from the sale/rent API.

api_list.name: Search for rent
api_list.description: Search for rental properties based on location and other criteria.

required_parameters.name: search_within_x_miles
required_parameters.description: The radius in miles to search for rental properties.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: Address, School, City, Zip or Neighborhood to search for rentals.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page number for pagination, must be larger than 0.

optional_parameters.name: keyword_search
optional_parameters.description: Keywords to filter properties, e.g., Pool, Basement.

optional_parameters.name: max_sqft
optional_parameters.description: Maximum square footage of the rental property.

api_list.name: Search for sale
api_list.description: Search for properties available for sale based on location and other criteria.

required_parameters.name: search_within_x_miles
required_parameters.description: The radius in miles to search for properties for sale.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: Address, School, City, Zip or Neighborhood to search for properties.

optional_parameters.name: has_pool
optional_parameters.description: Filter properties that have a pool.

api_list.name: Auto complete
api_list.description: Find location suggestions based on user input.

required_parameters.name: input
required_parameters.description: Enter the address or Zip code you want to search for.
